Indian Economy.title: Towards measuring the economy more accurately
Indian Economy.summary: The govt has upgraded statistical systems to capture job, output, income, consumption and investment data more reliably and frequently

Indian Economy.title: What awaits the US in 2026: A Goldilocks economy, shallow recession or no-landing scenario?
Indian Economy.summary: Many indicators point to economic weakness in America, but the downturn may be short-lived. If the US economy stages a recovery in 2026 and the Chinese economy stays resilient, the global outlook will improve. Proceed with cautious optimism.

Indian Economy.title: The IMF’s critique of India’s economic statistics is not a cause for alarm but a cue to improve data quality
Indian Economy.summary: The Fund awarded India a ‘C’ grade in its assessment of our macro data quality. Its criticism of our estimates is best taken as a cue to further improve the country’s statistical framework. Thankfully, remedial work has already begun.

Indian Economy.title: India in a 'sweet spot', GDP growth to grow over 7% this fiscal: FICCI President
Indian Economy.summary: Goenka also said that the chamber's focus for the coming year would be to increase the share of the manufacturing sector in the GDP from its current 15-17% to 20-25% levels over time

Indian Economy.title: Rupee has fallen and that is not a bad thing
Indian Economy.summary: The Reserve Bank of India’s (RBI) data shows the REER index dipping from an all-time high of 108.1 in November 2024 to 97.5 in October 2025.

Stock Market.title: Top Business & Market Headlines Today — BL Morning Report, Dec 02, 2025
Stock Market.summary: BL Morning Report Dec 02, 2025: Get today’s top business news, market headlines about the Stock Market, Sensex & Nifty trends, key market insights, economic highlights, and the latest updates from India and global markets.

Stock Market.title: Share Market Highlights: Sensex, Nifty end flat; rupee hits record closing low
Stock Market.summary: Sensex, Nifty updates on 3 December 2025: India’s benchmark indices extended losses for the fourth straight session on Wednesday, weighed down by delays in the US trade deal and a record-low rupee. Sensex closed at 85,106.81, slipping 31.46 points or 0.04%, a…

Stock Market.title: Stock Market Live Updates today December 2, 2025: Stock to buy today: Granules India (₹568.70) – BUY
Stock Market.summary: Sensex, Nifty, Share Prices LIVE: The short-term outlook is bullish for Granules India. The rise on Monday has taken the share price well above the 21-Day Moving Average (DMA). It also confirms the end of the correction that was in place since mid-October thi…

Stock Market.title: Stock benchmarks set to open higher after pause near record highs
Stock Market.summary: Stock benchmarks are set to open higher after profit booking, following record highs and mixed global market trends.

Stock Market.title: Nifty Bank Prediction Today – December 2, 2025: Nifty Bank futures: Uncertainty persists, traders can stay out
Stock Market.summary: Nifty Bank futures (December) can fall to 59,200 if it breaks below 59,700

Startups & Funding.title: Seattle’s Yoodli secures $40 million to expand AI learning, strengthen team
Startups & Funding.summary: Yoodli, an AI communication coaching platform, raised $40 million in a Series B funding led by WestBridge Capital. The funds will help the company enhance AI capabilities, and follow a $13.7 million round raised in May.

Startups & Funding.title: Fireside Ventures announces the final close of its Fund IV at ₹2,265 crore
Startups & Funding.summary: With Fund IV, Fireside’s total assets under management now stand at ₹5,300 crore ($650 million), consolidating its position as one of India’s largest consumer brand-focused venture platforms

Startups & Funding.title: Time, not capital, is a disruptor: Wakefit founder Ramalingegowda
Startups & Funding.summary: The company, which started as a direct-to-consumer player, now sells through marketplaces, quick commerce, its own website, channels, and offline stores. It has around 125 stores and plans to open another 170 over the next 12 to 18 months.

Startups & Funding.title: IIT placements bring startups into a hiring war with the bigwigs, who wins?
Startups & Funding.summary: This year's IIT placements see startups offering higher salaries and bonuses but struggle to attract top talent, competing with tech giants. While many firms aim for IPOs, enthusiasm for startups remains low among IIT students compared to NITs and IIITs.

Banking & Finance.title: Rupee has fallen and that is not a bad thing
Banking & Finance.summary: The Reserve Bank of India’s (RBI) data shows the REER index dipping from an all-time high of 108.1 in November 2024 to 97.5 in October 2025.

Banking & Finance.title: Complaints to RBI ombudsman rise 13% in FY25; witness jump in grievances
Banking & Finance.summary: Complaints to the RBI Ombudsman surged 13% in FY25, with notable grievances against private sector lenders and small finance banks.

Banking & Finance.title: RBI Ombudsman saw 13% increase in consumer complaints in FY25: Here's how to resolve your grievances
Banking & Finance.summary: Grievances against the banks comprised the largest portion, accounting for 81% of complaints received. This was followed by NBFCs accounting for 14.80% of complaints received during FY 2024-25.

Banking & Finance.title: International Day for People With Disabilities: ‘Biggest challenge is acceptance’: How head of Buddhist studies at SPPU did not let his visual impairment mar his ambition
Banking & Finance.summary: Born on November 16, 1975 in Maharashtra, Mahesh Ashok Deokar had a normal childhood until his vision loss.

Banking & Finance.title: Heartburn at lenders as loan rates fall but deposit rates don't
Banking & Finance.summary: Floating-rate loans are repriced immediately, while deposit rates are fixed, squeezing margins, public sector bank chiefs told RBI officials ahead of the 5 December policy outcome.

Technology Sector.title: Vivo X300 review: Outstanding cameras, superior performance make for the best compact flagship
Technology Sector.summary: A smartphone that promises smooth UI, faster performance, and cameras that deliver stunning frames is what drives a user. The Vivo X300 is a refreshing take on an all-rounder Android flagship.

Technology Sector.title: Indian man reveals his father takes away his entire salary, opens up about financial control: ‘This is abuse’
Technology Sector.summary: The man alleged that his father takes away his entire salary and doesn't even give him a monthly allowance.

Technology Sector.title: ‘Big Brother cannot watch us’: Opposition hits back after Centre mandates Sanchar Saathi app on all smartphones
Technology Sector.summary: The Department of Telecommunications has told companies that users should not be able to delete Sanchar Saathi, which allows users to report fraudulent calls and messages, and stolen mobile phones.

Technology Sector.title: First-ever AI model, cost-effective’: Mumbai to get its own independent AQI monitoring platform
Technology Sector.summary: At present, Mumbai has 28 Continuous Ambient Air Quality Monitoring Stations (CAAQMS) that record the city's AQI.

Technology Sector.title: India’s third n-sub soon, in final stages of trial: Navy chief
Technology Sector.summary: A senior Navy officer said the Russian SSN is likely to be delivered in 2027-28. “We are pushing for 2027, but it may come by 2028,” the officer said.
